title: Enchanting Emerald Vine Necklace: A Traditional Addigai with a Modern Flair
materials: Sparkling Cubic Zirconia (CZ). Features a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish for a timeless sheen.
features: This exquisite Addigai features a delicate vine design meticulously crafted in gold. Each leaf and flower is adorned with shimmering CZs, creating a captivating sparkle. The focal point showcases vibrant emeralds nestled within floral motifs, adding a touch of regal elegance. The intricate openwork and delicate filigree detailing highlight the unparalleled artistry of our skilled artisans.
colors: Predominantly yellow gold with vibrant green emerald accents and brilliant white CZs.
occasions: and other special occasions. Also suitable for sophisticated evening wear or a touch of cultural elegance in modern settings.
description: A harmonious blend of traditional Telugu jewelry design with contemporary aesthetics. The high-quality emeralds and meticulously placed CZs create a luxurious and eye-catching piece. Handcrafted by skilled artisans using time-honored techniques, ensuring exceptional durability and lasting beauty. A statement piece that adds a touch of regal grace to any ensemble.
